data.title: Who are Charles D. Sherwood's parents?
data.meta_description: I cannot get past Chareles D. Sherwood on my family tree. I know that he was born in May 13 ... , Dutchess, NY and married Josephine Lee. Thank you!
data.text:
This is so much fun... not direct proof that your Charles was son of Isa and Betsey, BUT proof that Jay Sherwood, son of Isa and Betsey, was living with his sister and brother-in-law in Dover in 1870-- i.e., connecting the New Milford, CT Sherwood family with at least one family in Dover, NY:

1880 US Census: Dover, Dutchess, New York:

Marcy, Griffin, 40, farmer, self and parents b NY

-, Phebe, 41, wife, self and parents b Connecticut

some Marcy children, and then:

Sherwood, Bitsey?, 70, mother-in-law, widow, b Connecticut

Betsey also went back to Connecticut to die/be buried:

"Connecticut Deaths and Burials, 1772-1934," index, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:F7J6-L53 : accessed 18 April 2015), Betsey Sherwood, 14 Oct 1887; citing , reference 154; FHL microfilm 3,353.

Name: Betsey Sherwood Gender: Female Death Date: 14 Oct 1887 Age: 72 Birth Date: 1815 Marital Status: Married Spouse's Name: Ira

Indexing Project (Batch) Number: B03749-4 , System Origin: Connecticut-EASy, GS Film number: 3353 , Reference ID: 154

Asahel was grandson of Gideon. Here's an interesting bit about Gideon to save for later (he doesnt yet have a profile on wikitree)

Miscellaneous papers, 1635-1789, index: (Connecticut Archives)

Sherwood, Martha [Nichols], New Milford, widow, petition showing her house took fire Feb. 25 last & her husband, Gideon Sherwood, 6 children & one other person were burned to death. Also about 40 in cash & household goods were lost. There are two remaining children to support & she asks abatement of tax due from the estate & a brief for charitable contributions. Grâ€¦ay 1778. III: 48, 49.

What appears to be the full text of this request can be found here:

Connecticut. The Public Records of the State of Connecticut, 1895. 1895. Reprint. London: Forgotten Books, 2013. 146-7. Print.
